# Ekhane Aamar Swarga

| music          = R. D. Burman

| gross          =

Ekhane Aamar Swarga is a 1990 Bengali film directed by Jahar Biswas and produced by K. C. N. Chandrashekhar. The film's music was composed by R. D. Burman.
Cast
* Soumitra Chatterjee
* Tapas Paul
* Deepika Chikhalia
* Ruma Guha Thakurta
* Sumitra Mukherjee
* Shakuntala Barua
